column5: License #ON783833 HIN # PLX10547E708  Shorelander Trailer S/N 1MDGS8N168A390779 Plate D3177X ----------------------------------------------------------------------  If you see this boat call 911 IMMEDIATELY! Do not approach anyone, do not be a hero. The goal is to get the boat back. If you see it also contact Need2Fish here.
Good luck, hoping for a safe return.
That's a shame. Hope he gets it back. Can you tell us whereabouts it was taken from?
dang that sure does suck where was it taken from Rick?
Hi, It was my boat that was stolen and it was stolen from the east end of Ottawa (Orleans area).
I would guess it is far from where it was taken by now. The last boat theft ring ended up being in Quebec somewhere IIRC.
We'll keep our eyes open on this part of the river...
basicly from the same area both  eyes are open ...... this sucks
